mapper.update: UPDATE LGI_HTR SET LGO_DT = SYSDATE WHERE LGI_HTR_ID = ( SELECT MAX(LGI_HTR_ID) FROM LGI_HTR WHERE MBR_ID = #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT LGI_HTR_ID lgiHtrId , MBR_ID id , LGI_IP lgiIp , LGI_DT lgiDt , LGO_DT lgoDt FROM LGI_HTR WHERE MBR_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY LGI_HTR_ID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MBR SET LGI_F_CT = 0 , IS_ACC_LCK = 'N' , LATEST_LGI_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE MBR SET LGI_F_CT = LGI_F_CT + 1 , LATEST_LGI_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE MBR SET IS_ACC_LCK = 'Y' WHERE ID = #{id} AND LGI_F_CT >= 5
mapper.select: SELECT ID id , PWD password , NM name , EMAIL email , HIGHEST_EDU_LV highestEducationLevel , UNIV_NM universityName , MJR_NM majorName , GRDT_TP graduationType , BRTH_DT birthDate , PHONE_NMB phoneNumber , MBR_TP memberType FROM MBR WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MBR SET MDF_F_CT = 0 , IS_MDF_LCK = 'N' WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE MBR SET IS_MDF_LCK = 'Y' WHERE ID = #{id} AND MDF_F_CT >= 3
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(IS_MDF_LCK) FROM MBR WHERE ID = #{id} AND IS_MDF_LCK = 'Y'
